title: Net Impact IIT Kharagpur
content: Net Impact IIT Kharagpur , an affiliate of Net Impact , is a newly formed student-run organization at Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur. [ 1 ] The chapter aims at creating a positive impact in the campus. The students can use the platform to develop themselves for the type of career they are looking for. The events and projects aim not only to provide a learning experience, but also a networking platform for the students to interact with the corporate and other students having similar interests.

The mission of Net Impact- IIT Kharagpur is to inspire and empower individuals to make personal and professional advancements, and to use the power of business to create a more socially and environmentally sustainable world.

1) To fulfill this mission, Net Impact- IIT Kharagpur will remain committed to providing the students with an array of opportunities that will cheer students to develop and use their skills to make positive impact on the world.
2) Help them to make positive personal change to fit into a corporate or social world.
3) Give them chances to interact with leaders and role models and to enlarge their professional network.
